title: Read InDesign Markup Language (IDML) Files
text: goal idmlr read (eventually) modify write InDesign Markup Language (IDML) files.

title: Read InDesign Markup Language (IDML) Files
text: can install development version idmlr GitHub :

title: Read InDesign Markup Language (IDML) Files
text: basic example shows read IDML file:
code: library(idmlr)   read_idml(system.file("idml/letter_portrait_standard.idml", package = "idmlr")) #> <idml[3]> #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        file  #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               letter_portrait_standard.idml  #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        path  #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  /var/folders/3f/50m42dx1333_dfqb5772j6_40000gn/T//RtmpfmpL6W/letter_portrait_standard.idml  #>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    contents  #> <pointer: 0x14460d810>, <pointer: 0x14463bad0>, <pointer: 0x144635d90>, <pointer: 0x144635aa0>, <pointer: 0x144661740>, <pointer: 0x144661470>, <pointer: 0x14466aeb0>, <pointer: 0x144664900>, <pointer: 0x1446b27f0>, <pointer: 0x14466aca0>, <pointer: 0x1446c6370>, <pointer: 0x1446b25e0>, <pointer: 0x107c2df00>, <pointer: 0x107c2dc10>, <pointer: 0x1346d6b00>, <pointer: 0x1346d6830>, <pointer: 0x1346dad10>, <pointer: 0x1346dac00>, <pointer: 0x1346e0ad0>, <pointer: 0x1346e0860>, <pointer: 0x1346e53d0>, <pointer: 0x1346e5160>, <pointer: 0x1346e6460>, <pointer: 0x1346e6130>, application/vnd.adobe.indesign-idml-package

title: Check IDML objects — check_idml
text: [check_idml_resource()] helps check `idml` object contains expected resource file.

title: Check IDML objects — check_idml
code: check_idml_resource(   idml,   resource = NULL,   arg = caller_arg(idml),   call = caller_env() )

title: Check IDML objects — check_idml
text: idml `idml` class object created [read_idml()]. resource One resource names: "Graphic.xml", "Fonts.xml", "Styles.xml"

what: S3 object functions for idml class objects — idml
title: S3 object functions for idml class objects — idml
text: S3 object functions idml class objects

title: S3 object functions for idml class objects — idml
S3 object functions for idml class objects — idml
text: file File name input IDML file. path Path location unzipped IDML file. directory XML files located. contents named list `xml_document` objects. idml object validate `idml` class object. type MIMETYPE value use validating `idml` objects.

what: Get contents from an IDML object — idml_contents
title: Get contents from an IDML object — idml_contents
text: [get_idml_contents()] helper extracting converting `xml_document` objects `idml` list object.

title: Get contents from an IDML object — idml_contents
code: get_idml_contents(   idml,   dir = NULL,   file = NULL,   format = "xml_document",   ns = character(),   error_call = caller_env() )

title: Get contents from an IDML object — idml_contents
text: idml `idml` class object created [read_idml()]. dir, file Directory file name IDML contents return. format "list" "xml_document". "list", contents converted [xml2::as_list()] using supplied `ns` parameter. ns Optionally, named vector giving prefix-url pairs, produced xml_ns(). provided, names explicitly qualified ns prefix, .e. element bar defined namespace foo, called foo:bar. (similarly attributes). Default namespaces must given explicit name. ns ignored using xml_name<-() xml_set_name(). error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

what: Get fonts, styles, and graphics from an IDML object — idml_resource
title: Get fonts, styles, and graphics from an IDML object — idml_resource
text: Get fonts, styles, graphics IDML object [get_idml_resource()] extracts resource `idml` object supplied format. [get_idml_fonts()], [get_idml_styles()], [get_idml_graphic()], [get_idml_preferences()] helpers extracting Fonts.xml, Styles.xml, Graphic.xml, Preferences.xml files.

title: Get fonts, styles, and graphics from an IDML object — idml_resource
code: get_idml_resource(   idml,   resource,   format = "xml_document",   ...,   error_call = caller_env() )  get_idml_fonts(idml, format = "xml_document", ...)  get_idml_styles(idml, format = "xml_document", ...)  get_idml_graphic(idml, format = "xml_document", ...)  get_idml_preferences(idml, format = "xml_document", ...)

title: Get fonts, styles, and graphics from an IDML object — idml_resource
text: idml `idml` class object created [read_idml()]. resource One resource names: "Graphic.xml", "Fonts.xml", "Styles.xml" format "list" "xml_document". "list", contents converted [xml2::as_list()] using supplied `ns` parameter. ... Arguments passed get_idml_contents ns Optionally, named vector giving prefix-url pairs, produced xml_ns(). provided, names explicitly qualified ns prefix, .e. element bar defined namespace foo, called foo:bar. (similarly attributes). Default namespaces must given explicit name. ns ignored using xml_name<-() xml_set_name(). error_call execution environment currently running function, e.g. caller_env(). function mentioned error messages source error. See call argument abort() information.

title: idmlr: Read InDesign Markup Language (IDML) Files — idmlr-package

what: Read an InDesign Markup Language (IDML) file to a `idml` object — read_idml
title: Read an InDesign Markup Language (IDML) file to a `idml` object — read_idml
text: [read_idml()] takes file path `idml` file returns `idml` object: list containing file name, file path, contents file list `xml_document` objects character vectors (MIMETYPE file ).

title: Read an InDesign Markup Language (IDML) file to a `idml` object — read_idml
Read an InDesign Markup Language (IDML) file to a `idml` object — read_idml
text: file Path file ending `.idml` file extension. ... Additional parameters passed [xml2::read_xml()] exdir Directory extract files using [base::unzip()], Default: `tempdir()`.

title: Read an InDesign Markup Language (IDML) file to a `idml` object — read_idml
